tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE EquipmentSpecifications (
	equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	equipment_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	equipment_type VARCHAR(50),
	equipment_brand VARCHAR(50),
	equipment_model VARCHAR(50),
	equipment_description TEXT,
	operation_manual TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE EquipmentSpecifications (
  equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_name VARCHAR(255),
  equipment_type VARCHAR(100),
  description TEXT,
  manual_url VARCHAR(500)
);

CREATE TABLE OperationManuals (
  manual_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT,
  manual_text TEXT,
  CONSTRAINT fk_equipment
    FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id)
    REFERENCES EquipmentSpecifications(equipment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE EquipmentSpecifications (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  model_number VARCHAR(50),
  brand VARCHAR(50),
  year_of_manufacture INT,
  specification_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE OperationManuals (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT,
  manual_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  manual_text TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES EquipmentSpecifications(id)
);

CREATE TABLE TrainingSessions (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  session_date DATE,
  session_duration INT,
  trainer_name VARCHAR(100),
  equipment_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES EquipmentSpecifications(id)
);

CREATE TABLE OperationManuals (
    manual_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT,
    manual_title VARCHAR(100),
    manual_content TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES EquipmentSpecifications(equipment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ARTrainingSessions (
    session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    session_date DATE,
    equipment_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES EquipmentSpecifications(equipment_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE EquipmentSpecifications (
  equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_name VARCHAR(255),
  manufacturer VARCHAR(255),
  model_number VARCHAR(50),
  specifications TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE OperationManuals (
  manual_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT,
  manual_title VARCHAR(255),
  manual_content TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES EquipmentSpecifications(equipment_id)
)

CREATE TABLE ARTrainingSessions (
  session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  session_date DATE,
  equipment_id INT,
  manual_id INT,
  duration_hours DECIMAL(5,2),
  FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES EquipmentSpecifications(equipment_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (manual_id) REFERENCES OperationManuals(manual_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE,
  email VARCHAR(100),
  password VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE UserSessions (
  user_id INT,
  session_id INT,
  PRIMARY KEY (user_id, session_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (session_id) REFERENCES ARTrainingSessions(session_id)
)
